summary: **Tetris** is a popular puzzle game created in 1985 by Russian engineer Alexey Pajitnov. Players stack falling blocks (called tetrominoes) to complete lines. Completed lines disappear, and players score points. The game ends when the screen fills up. It's been played on many devices and is one of the best-selling video games ever, with over 200 million copies sold. Tetris has even affected art, music, and science.
title: Tetris
